name: Troubles Be Gone
description:
Troubles Be Gone

Everybody in town is having trouble of some sorts. People worry about hair loss, an unanswered love or maybe they want somebody gone... permanently.

A modern Witch with a knack for business has opened a potion shop: 'Troubles Be Gone'. Here you can buy every potion you need. In order to keep her customers satisfied, she works around the clock. Catching 'ingredients' by night and cooking up and selling potions by day.

Sell enough potions to make money, remember that at the end of the day you'll have to pay your mortgage! Win the game by earning $150.

This game was made for microStudio Mini Jam #2.

  • Main Theme: Trouble
  • Visual Theme: Halloween
  • Additional requirement: Use only 2 colors (with) shades and gray shades.
